name: Beat Blast
description:
About this game
Beat Blast is a music maker bullet hell. Make a beat by traversing through levels collecting new sounds and powers. Combine your musical notes in different ways to create the songs and powers you want. Collect unique power note sounds to unlock powerful abilities. Destroy bosses and enemies with the music you make. The world is full of hypnotic sounds to groove with. Be your own soundtrack!
Music, powers, enemies, bosses and dungeons.
